mapper.insert: insert into att_order(order_no, order_price, order_lastprice, user_no, att_date, buyer_tel, buyer_email, buyer_name, att_no, coupon_no, total_quantity) values (att_order_no_seq.nextval, #{price}, #{lastPrice}, #{userNo}, #{attDate}, #{buyerTel}, #{buyerEmail}, #{buyerName}, #{attNo}, #{couponNo}, #{totalQuantity})
insert into att_order_product(order_no, product_quantity, option_no) values (att_order_no_seq.currval, #{productQuantity}, #{optionNo})

select att_order_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into att_order(order_no, order_price, order_lastprice, user_no, att_date, buyer_tel, buyer_email, buyer_name, att_no, coupon_no, total_quantity) values (#{orderNo}, #{price}, #{lastPrice}, #{userNo}, #{attDate}, #{buyerTel}, #{buyerEmail}, #{buyerName}, #{attNo}, #{couponNo}, #{totalQuantity})
insert into att_order_product(order_no, product_quantity, option_no) values (att_order_no_seq.currval, #{productQuantity}, #{optionNo})
mapper.select: select a.order_no, a.att_date, a.order_price, a.order_lastprice, a.user_no, a.buyer_tel, a.buyer_email, a.buyer_name, a.att_no, a.coupon_no, a.order_process, a.total_quantity, p.product_quantity, p.option_no, o.att_price, o.att_option, t.att_name from att_order a, att_order_product p, att_option o, attraction t where a.order_no = p.order_no(+) and p.option_no = o.att_optno(+) and a.att_no = t.att_no and user_no=#{userNo} order by att_date

select o.order_no as orderNo, o.order_price as price, o.order_lastPrice as lastPrice, o.user_no, o.buyer_tel as buyerTel, o.buyer_email as buyerEmail, o.buyer_name as buyerName, o.total_quantity as totalQuantity, o.coupon_no as couponNo, p.product_quantity as productQuantity, opt.att_option as optionName, opt.att_price as optionPrice, t.att_name as attName from att_order o, att_order_product p, att_option opt, attraction t where o.order_no = p.order_no(+) and p.option_no = opt.att_optno(+) and o.att_no = t.att_no(+) and o.order_no = #{orderNo} and o.user_no = #{userNo}
